Featured Projects

Advanced Notepad Application

Developed a comprehensive text editor using modern Windows technologies. This project showcases advanced UI design and functionality implementation, featuring a clean and intuitive interface with powerful text editing capabilities.

Key Features:

  • Multi-tab editing with TabView for enhanced productivity
  • Advanced Find & Replace functionality with regex support
  • Complete Undo/Redo system with unlimited history
  • Comprehensive text operations (Copy/Paste/Cut)
  • Dynamic zoom controls for better accessibility
  • Customizable font selection and formatting
  • Responsive UI design that adapts to different screen sizes
WinUI 3 C# Windows App SDK XAML Team Collaboration
